body_html:
Yes, this feature is not implemented, but it is relatively easy to add. Would you be willing to contribute a pull request. In particular look at
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_grad.py#L388
(for ReluGradGrad). You can follow suite for Relu6.
body_text:
Yes, this feature is not implemented, but it is relatively easy to add. Would you be willing to contribute a pull request. In particular look at
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_grad.py#L388
(for ReluGradGrad). You can follow suite for Relu6.
body:
Yes, this feature is not implemented, but it is relatively easy to add. Would you be willing to contribute a pull request. In particular look at
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_grad.py#L388
(for ReluGradGrad). You can follow suite for Relu6.
